I left college the summer of 2011 with three friends to move to San Francisco and pursue professional software development.

Following that I’ve worked at:

  • Flint Mobile Payments: OCR mobile payments.
  • MixRank: Competitive advertising analytics.
  • BlackJet: Uber for private jets.
  • CircuitHub: Small volume electronics manufacturing.
  • GetScale: High volume consumer electronics manfacturing, tooling and management.
